definition: an ancient symbol in the form of a cross with its ends bent at an angle of 90°, used in the 20th century as the symbol of the German Nazi party
the sport or activity of riding a bicycle
the sport or activity of riding a bicycle or motorcycle
the idea that everything that happens to you in your life is already decided and that you cannot do anything to change or control it
a type of gear on a bicycle that works by lifting the chain from one gearwheel to another larger or smaller one
